topic.title: Content sign failed: invalid private key.
topic.body:
this somehow sometimes happened when i try to make a comment on an article of a site - one comment can go ok but the very next may get this error message. 

site i am working on now and the error message i am getting right now is at this address -  

http://127.0.0.1:43110/1CpQfwShA6D8kAc4o3tu46GK1i89UtGP2o/?Post:3
